whitelist_title.message: Enable file link addon for whitelisted URLs

whitelist_description.message: Any URLs that are added to the whitelist will enable local file links if you're browsing to that address. * will enable all. Empty will disable all. Multiple URLs are space separated. Wildcards are allowed e.g. *://*.trello.com/*

enableExecutables_title.message: Enable links to local executable files
enableExecutables_title.description: Settings title for enable of executable files

enableExecutables_description.message: If enabled any progam file can be launched by the addon. (Attention! A malicious site could use this for denial-of-service attack!)

enableLinkIcons_title.description: Settings title for enable link icons

enableLinkIcons_description.message: If checked there will be a link added to every local link

enableJsSupport_title.description: Settings title for enable Javascript support

enableJsSupport_description.message: If enabled JavaScript of the web page can use `window.location.assign` or `window.open` to open any local files or folders - recommended to only activate this option on whitelisted urls.

revealOpenOption_title.description: Settings title for default link click behaviour

revealOpenOption_description.message: Changes the default click behaviour of file-links. Default = direct file link open.
revealOpenOption_description.description: Settings description for default click behaviour

retries_on_failure_title.description: Settings title for retries on failure

retries_on_failure_description.message: The number of retries to open a file before an error will be displayed (e.g. file not found will be indicated after all retries failed)
retries_on_failure_description.description: Settings description for retries on failure

ERROR_EXECTUBALES_NOT_ENABLED.message: You're trying to open an executable file. Please check addon settings to enable executable files and try again.

INFO_CONFIG_CHANGED_SMB.message: Configuration changed! SMB links now enabled
INFO_CONFIG_CHANGED_SMB.description: Info message SMB configured (not used yet)

LABEL_CONTEXT_SUB_SELECTION_TITLE.description: Label text selection in context menu
